channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0595|2024-08-02T05:17:50.139Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20geo%20scada%20expert%202019
item.description: A CWE-117: Improper Output Neutralization for Logs vulnerability exists that could cause the misinterpretation of log files when malicious packets are sent to the Geo SCADA server's database web port (default 443). Affected products: EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2019, EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2020, EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2021(All Versions prior to October 2022), ClearSCADA (All Versions)

item.title: CVE-2023-1548|2024-08-02T05:49:11.660Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20control%20expert
item.description: A CWE-269: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability exists that could cause a local user to perform a denial of service through the console server service that is part of EcoStruxure Control Expert. Affected Products: EcoStruxure Control Expert (V15.1 and above)

item.title: CVE-2023-1049|2024-08-02T05:32:46.335Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%E2%84%A2%20operator%20terminal%20expert
item.description: A CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability exists that could cause execution of malicious code when an unsuspicious user loads a project file from the local filesystem into the HMI.

item.title: CVE-2024-5680|2024-08-01T21:18:06.841Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-129: Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-6407|2024-08-01T21:41:03.280Z -- schneider%20electric -- wiser%20home%20controller%20whc-5918a
item.description: CWE-200: Information Exposure vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of credentials when a specially crafted message is sent to the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5558|2024-08-01T21:18:06.335Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20as-p
item.description: CWE-367: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition vulnerability exists that could cause escalation of privileges when an attacker abuses a limited admin account.

item.title: CVE-2024-5560|2024-08-01T21:18:06.538Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-125: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device’s web interface when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-5557|2024-08-01T21:18:06.830Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20as-p
item.description: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability exists that could cause exposure of SNMP credentials when an attacker has access to the controller logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-5681|2024-08-01T21:18:06.902Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-6528|2024-08-01T21:41:03.525Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20controllers%20m241%20%2F%20m251
item.description: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability exists that could cause a vulnerability leading to a cross-site scripting condition where attackers can have a victim’s browser run arbitrary JavaScript when they visit a page containing the injected payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-5056|2024-08-01T21:03:10.683Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340
item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2024-5559|2024-08-01T21:18:06.557Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20p5
item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5313|2024-08-01T21:11:12.332Z -- schneider%20electric -- evlink%20home%20smart
item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-5679|2024-08-01T21:18:06.706Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-0568|2024-08-01T18:11:35.037Z -- schneider%20electric -- harmony%20control%20relay%20rmnf22tb30
item.description: CWE-287: Improper Authentication vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized tampering of device configuration over NFC communication.

item.title: CVE-2024-0865|2024-08-01T18:18:18.824Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20it%20gateway
item.description: CWE-798: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists that could cause local privilege escalation when logged in as a non-administrative user.

item.title: CVE-2024-6407|2024-07-23T18:26:28.645Z -- schneider%20electric -- wiser%20home%20controller%20whc-5918a
item.description: CWE-200: Information Exposure vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of credentials when a specially crafted message is sent to the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-6408|2024-07-17T19:36:47.656Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340%20cpu%20%28part%20numbers%20bmxp34%2A%29
item.description: CWE-924: Improper Enforcement of Message Integrity During Transmission in a Communication Channel vulnerability exists that could cause a denial of service and loss of confidentiality, integrity of controllers when conducting a Man in the Middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-5679|2024-07-11T18:01:50.665Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-5681|2024-07-11T13:24:56.089Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-5679|2024-07-11T08:18:23.853Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-2602|2024-07-11T08:46:13.920Z -- schneider%20electric -- foxrtu%20station
item.description: CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could result in remote code execution when an authenticated user executes a saved project file that has been tampered by a malicious actor.

item.title: CVE-2024-5681|2024-07-11T08:27:49.614Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-5680|2024-07-11T08:25:45.578Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-129: Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-5559|2024-07-01T21:26:14.765Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20p5
item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5557|2024-06-13T19:01:56.888Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20as-p
item.description: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability exists that could cause exposure of SNMP credentials when an attacker has access to the controller logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-37036|2024-06-12T17:57:45.916Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists that could result in an authentication bypass when sending a malformed POST request and particular configuration parameters are set.

item.title: CVE-2024-2747|2024-06-12T17:12:20.482Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20studio
item.description: CWE-428: Unquoted search path or element vulnerability exists in Easergy Studio, which could cause privilege escalation when a valid user replaces a trusted file name on the system and reboots the machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-37038|2024-06-12T17:54:11.618Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability exists that could allow an authenticated user with access to the device’s web interface to perform unauthorized file and firmware uploads when crafting custom web requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-0865|2024-06-12T17:23:00.908Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20it%20gateway
item.description: CWE-798: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists that could cause local privilege escalation when logged in as a non-administrative user.

item.title: CVE-2024-5559|2024-06-12T17:18:04.604Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20p5
item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5313|2024-06-12T15:04:51.869Z -- schneider%20electric -- evlink%20home%20smart
item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-27975|2024-06-04T17:24:48.765Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20control%20expert
item.description: CWE-522: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized access to the project file in EcoStruxure Control Expert when a local user tampers with the memory of the engineering workstation.

item.title: CVE-2023-6408|2024-02-14T16:52:24.805Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340%20cpu%20%28part%20numbers%20bmxp34%2A%29
item.description: CWE-924: Improper Enforcement of Message Integrity During Transmission in a Communication Channel vulnerability exists that could cause a denial of service and loss of confidentiality, integrity of controllers when conducting a Man in the Middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-6409|2024-02-14T16:47:05.519Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20control%20expert
item.description: CWE-798: Use of Hard-coded Credentials vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized access to a project file protected with application password when opening the file with EcoStruxure Control Expert.

item.title: CVE-2024-0568|2024-02-14T16:58:59.811Z -- schneider%20electric -- harmony%20control%20relay%20rmnf22tb30
item.description: CWE-287: Improper Authentication vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized tampering of device configuration over NFC communication.

item.title: CVE-2024-2229|2024-03-18T16:08:33.773Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20design%20-%20ecodial
item.description: CWE-502: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability exists that could cause remote code execution when a malicious project file is loaded into the application by a valid user.

item.title: CVE-2024-2052|2024-03-18T16:05:47.722Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20t200%20%28modbus%29%20models%3A%20t200i%2C%20t200e%2C%20t200p%2C%20t200s%2C%20t200h
item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists that could allow unauthenticated files and logs exfiltration and download of files when an attacker modifies the URL to download to a different location.

item.title: CVE-2024-2051|2024-03-18T16:03:44.987Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20t200%20%28modbus%29%20models%3A%20t200i%2C%20t200e%2C%20t200p%2C%20t200s%2C%20t200h
item.description: CWE-307: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability exists that could cause account takeover and unauthorized access to the system when an attacker conducts brute-force attacks against the login form.

item.title: CVE-2024-2050|2024-03-18T16:04:57.375Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20t200%20%28modbus%29%20models%3A%20t200i%2C%20t200e%2C%20t200p%2C%20t200s%2C%20t200h
item.description: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (‘Cross-site Scripting’) vulnerability exists when an attacker injects then executes arbitrary malicious JavaScript code within the context of the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-5056|2024-06-12T12:10:43.250Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340
item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2024-5313|2024-06-12T12:14:58.979Z -- schneider%20electric -- evlink%20home%20smart
item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.description: CWE-125: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device’s web interface when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.description: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability exists that could allow an authenticated user with access to the device’s web interface to perform unauthorized file and firmware uploads when crafting custom web requests.

item.description: CWE-367: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition vulnerability exists that could cause escalation of privileges when an attacker abuses a limited admin account.

item.description: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability exists that could cause exposure of SNMP credentials when an attacker has access to the controller logs.

item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists that could result in an authentication bypass when sending a malformed POST request and particular configuration parameters are set.

item.title: CVE-2024-37039|2024-06-12T16:54:23.117Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-252: Unchecked Return Value vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-37040|2024-06-12T16:56:06.117Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input (‘Classic Buffer Overflow’) vulnerability exists that could allow a user with access to the device’s web interface to cause a fault on the device when sending a malformed HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-37037|2024-06-12T16:50:09.159Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory (‘Path Traversal’) vulnerability exists that could allow an authenticated user with access to the device’s web interface to corrupt files and impact device functionality when sending a crafted HTTP request.

item.description: CWE-125: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device’s web interface when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.description: CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input (‘Classic Buffer Overflow’) vulnerability exists that could allow a user with access to the device’s web interface to cause a fault on the device when sending a malformed HTTP request.
